	<div id="media">
		<img src="/design/images/654-272/epc-guestroom-6264.jpg" alt="Error 404">
	</div>

<div id="main_middle">
	<section id="content" class="clearfix">
		<div class="content_header clearfix">
				<h1 class="page_title">Error 404</h1><h2 class="tagline">Oops! Looks like we have a fish out of water. Please be patient while we update our site.</h1>
		</div>
